name: The Intrepid's Tower
description:
Climb the Intrepid's Tower in this retro Game Boy like Game! :D

How To Play

Z, Q, S and D to move, J to jump, O to uh do nothing, V to skip a Level (Costs you a joker, you have five at the beginning) and B to start/reset the Level!

The Story

A mysterious tower is feared by every knight in the region.

But one day, Arcadaes decides to reach its top to prove that he's strong.

Will he succeed?

Spoiler alert: He does

Features

- 50 Levels

- Game Boy styled graphics

- Terrible OST

Other Random Things

There are some glitchs in the Game, sorry for that... ^^'

This was made in one week for the 6th Game Boy Jam, hope you enjoy!
